  • chqbook - Sales Manager - Insurance(General Insurance -Motor/Health Insurance)

    Sales July 01, 2022

    Job Overview:

    The Sales Manager will be responsible for handling the CSOs based out of Chqbook Partner stores. These CSOs through direct interaction with customers will pitch and sell Motor Insurance, health insurance, life insurance and other financial products. Sales Managers will be responsible for driving productivity of each store as per agreed numbers. Sales Manages to be highly motivated people with confidence, integrity, knowledge and problem solving.

    Read More →

  • udaan - Sales Officer

    Sales May 20, 2022

    udaan is a B2B ecommerce platform that brings traders, wholesalers, distributors, retailers, and manufacturers in India on to a single platform. Our goal is to make ‘doing business’ easy in India & make B2B commerce convenient and efficient.

    udaan Capital is the NBFC arm of Udaan & offers credit services to buyers and sellers on and off udaan’s B2B ecommerce platform to grow their business further. This space is largely untapped with less than 10% of MSMEs having access to working capital loans from financial institutions. In this way, udaan is uniquely positioned to formalize &scale trade credit.

    Read More →

  • vivriti - Domestic Sales

    Sales May 04, 2022

    Who we are:

    Vivriti is a young, dynamic, and spirited institution that boasts of a large appetite for success through its vision of creating the largest and most valuable platform for enterprise finance. The word ‘Vivriti’ means progress or development and speaks volumes about our passion to continuously strive for results that add value to our ecosystem. At Vivriti, we are mission driven, challenging the status quo each day, reinventing the Indian mid-market debt market space, and creating an industry in itself.

    Sales Topsales April 01, 2022

    Pariksha is India's largest vernacular test preparation App that helps aspirants from Bharat prepare for any state government job exam in the language of their choice, through videos and live streaming classes in the most affordable, convenient, and enriching manner. We are currently operational in 13 states and 8 languages across India with a constant zeal to expand further. Pariksha is founded by an alumnus of IIT Kanpur and Symbiosis International.
